description: Hiking trip to Mt Tom Taylor
directions: Choose bedwell trail  at the south end of Buttle Lake on Vancouver ISland. Leave Bedwell Lake on your left and pass a small Lake to the south. Continue SW and onto a broad E facing ridge. Leave Taylor Glacier to your right and head to Mt Tom Taylor along a narrow ridge (SW). Last ascent to the top requires rock climnbing 4-5 grade (1 pitch).20Km both ways
title: Mt Tom Taylor
